events.name: eds-filter-value-changed
events.description:
fired when the value of the filter changes. Contains the new value
as the details (If `type-in` or `select` then it's a string, if `multi-select` 
an array of strings)

properties.name: clearOptionText
properties.description: Clear option text when filter type is type-in-select or multi-select

properties.name: currentValue
properties.description:
represents the current filter value. If `type-in` or `select` then it's a
string, if `multi-select` an array of strings

properties.name: dropdownPanelMaxWidthPercent
properties.description:
sets the maximum width of dropdown panel by using
`dropdownPanelMaxWidthPercent` property of underlying dropdown component.

properties.name: isDarkTheme
properties.description: forces filter to render in a lights-off theme

properties.name: items
properties.description:
values to be used for a dropdown-based filter (`select` or `multi-select`).
Each item can be defined as follows:
```
{
 "label": "Option 1", // the string shown in the filter
 "value": "valueString" //the underlying value
}
```

properties.name: labelIcon
properties.description:
Allows a `select` or `multi-select` filter to be driven from an icon.
If the value is an empty object it will by default use a filter icon,
but the icon can be overriden by defining an object that will configure an eds-icon:
```
{
 'loadMethod': ,
 'filename': ,
 'svgStyle': ,
 'baseSvgPath':
}
```
Refer to `eds-icon` for more information on those properties.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Placeholder for the textbox or dropdown

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Type of the filter:
- type-in
- select
- multi-select

EDSFilter.description: The **filter** component enables the user to input or select a keyword or phrase for purposes of filtering the scope of content displayed in the application interface at any given time. Multiple filters may be employed at the same time, establishing combined parameters to further narrow the scope of content displayed.
EDSFilter.name: Filter
EDSFilter.usage:
The following css variables are available for styling :

type-in filter:

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-textbox-background-color | background color
--eds-textbox-text-color | color
--eds-textbox-border-color | border color
--eds-textbox-placeholder-color | placeholder
--eds-icon-color | icon color (filter or close icons)
--eds-textbox-hover-border-color | hover border color
--eds-textbox-border-focused-color | focused border color

events.name: eds-filter-value-changed
events.description:
fired when the value of the filter changes. Contains the new value
as the details (If `type-in` or `select` then it's a string, if `multi-select` 
an array of strings)
